response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is not just any product; it's a game-changer in its field, offering unparalleled features and benefits. We believe in its value immensely, and we're confident it could significantly enhance your operations or personal needs. Considering its quality and the time, effort, and resources invested into it, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece of cutting-edge technology at a discounted rate. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 7500}
